Title: Increases the penalty for predatory sexual assault against a child to imprisonment for a minimum of twenty-five years
Summary: Increases the penalty for predatory sexual assault against a child to imprisonment for a minimum of twenty-five years; re-classifies such crime as a class A felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the penalty for predatory sexual assault against a child to imprisonment for a minimum of twenty-five years
